text: "The Last One" is a single produced by the hard rock band Black Veil Brides off of their album Vale. The single was released on December 22, 2017. It peaked at number 34 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock charts. == References == *https://www.billboard.com/music/black-veil-brides/chart- history/billboard-200/song/1060769 Category:Pages created with the Article Wizard from 2018 Category:2017 songs
title: The Last One (Black Veil Brides song)
